description:
The Royal Opera House in London's Covent Garden is where truly incredible artists excite audiences, night after night.  Home to The Royal Ballet, The Royal Opera and The Orchestra of the Royal Opera House and ROH2, almost 300 performances are given on the main stage every year, showcasing stars of opera and ballet alongside rising talent, and inspiring audiences around the globe through cinema, television, radio and DVD.

In addition to the 300 performances on the main stage each year, there is a wealth of other activity including backstage tours, free lunchtime recitals, jazz concerts, tea dances and schools’ and community projects. 

Features include: Videos, Photographs and podcasts, Information about productions and performances, Event calendar, Twitter integration
